name: Enrique Olvera
description: Enrique Olvera is a Mexican chef. He is the owner and head chef of Pujol, a Mexican haute cuisine restaurant in Mexico City, which is currently ranked 9th in the world according to the 2021 annual

name: Juan Hernandez
description: Chef Juan specializes in modern Mexican cuisine and enjoys using unique ingredients and flavor combinations in his dishes.

name: Martha Ortiz
description: Martha Ortiz is a master of Mexican street food and loves creating flavorful and affordable dishes for her guests.

name: Edgar Núñez
description: Chef Edgar Núñez is an up-and-coming chef who combines Mexican and European cuisine in his dishes.

name: Javier Plascencia
description: Chef Javier Plascencia is a Mexican culinary icon and has authored several cookbooks that showcase the diversity and richness of Mexican cuisine.

name: Pati Jinich
description: Pati Jinich is a young and innovative chef who combines Mexican and Asian flavors in his dishes.
